Thank you, (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) Supervisory Staff Attorney CLC New York Metropolitan Correctional Center 150 Park Row New York, New York 10007 p: (646)836-6455 f: (646)836-7665 (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @nysd.uscourts.gov> 8/12/2019 2:42 PM>> (b)(6): please thank the Warden for his prompt response to my letter. Richard M. Berman On Aug 12, 2019, at 2:37 PM, Christine Murray (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @nysd.uscourts.gov> wrote: fyi ----- Forwarded by Christine Murray/NYSD/02/USCOURTS on 08/12/2019 02:37 PM ----- From: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov> To: "Lamine N'Diaye" (b)(6) @bop.gov>, Cc: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @nysd.uscourts.gov>, (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @nysd.uscourts.gov>, (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @usdoj.gov>, (b)(6), (b)(6) @att.net> Date: 08/12/2019 02:33 PM Subject: Re: Jeffrey Epstein 19 cr 490 Good afternoon, Attached please find Warden N'Diaye's response to Your Honor's inquiry. Please let us know if you need further information. Thank you, (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) Supervisory Staff Attorney CLC New York Metropolitan Correctional Center 150 Park Row Page 2120 DOJ-OGR-00024191

text_blocks.content:
Fwd: Jeffrey Epstein 19 cr 490
From Lee Plourde
To James Petrucci
Date 2019/08/14 17:40
Subject: Fwd: Jeffrey Epstein 19 cr 490
Attachments: TEXT.htm

---------- Original message ---------
From: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov>
Date: 8/14/19 5:29 PM (GMT-05:00)
To: Lee Plourde (b)(6) @bop.gov>, James Petrucci (b)(6) @bop.gov>
Subject: Fwd: Jeffrey Epstein 19 cr 490

Dear Judge Berman,

I will be happy to do so. Please let me know if I can be of further assistance.

Thank you,

(b)(6), (b)(7)(C)

Supervisory Staff Attorney
CLC New York
Metropolitan Correctional Center
150 Park Row
New York, New York 10007
p: (646)836-6455
f: (646)836-7665

(b)(6): please thank the Warden for his prompt response to my letter.
Richard M. Berman

On Aug 12, 2019, at 2:37 PM, Christine Murray (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @nysd.uscourts.gov> wrote:

fyi

----- Forwarded by Christine Murray/NYSD/02/USCOURTS on 08/12/2019 02:37 PM -----

From: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov>
To: "Lamine N'Diaye" (b)(6) @bop.gov>, <BermanNYSDChambers@nysd.uscourts.gov>
Cc: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @nysd.uscourts.gov>, (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @nysd.uscourts.gov>, (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @usdoj.gov>,
(b)(6), (b)(6) @att.net>
Date: 08/12/2019 02:33 PM
Subject: Re: Jeffrey Epstein 19 cr 490

Good afternoon,

Attached please find Warden N'Diaye's response to Your Honor's inquiry. Please let us know if you need further information.

Thank you,

(b)(6), (b)(7)(C)

Supervisory Staff Attorney
CLC New York
Metropolitan Correctional Center
150 Park Row

additional_notes: The document is an email chain with multiple redactions, primarily related to the Jeffrey Epstein case. The emails discuss a response to a judge's inquiry and contain information about the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
